name: Jump! Jump! A Salary Man Adventure
name_original: Jump! Jump! A Salary Man Adventure
description:
Jump! Jump! is a game in which you accompany our character to get to the office on time, but it won't be easy, strange creatures have arrived in the city, you have to dodge them!


The music is by Nojisuma, here you can find his work on Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/es/users/nojisuma-23737290/ The sounds are from kenney, on this same platform: https://kenney.itch.io/ Thank you both for your generosity. The game has some problems, the animations sometimes don't play as they should, but the most serious problem is with some collisions. So, if the ground fails and the character falls into the infinite abyss, press the restart button and start again, fortunately it doesn't happen often, at least on my computer. Unfortunately, my knowledge of Unity isn't much and I haven't been able to fix any of these bugs, I hope they don't bother too much.
